caption.p: Julian day of collection for flowering Polemonium and Salix as a function of average daily low temperature in June of the collection year. Open circles and solid line show data for Salix while triangular symbols, and dashed line show data for Polemonium ( y = 228.0−3.70 x and y = 235.2−4.26 x; respectively). Overlapping points are offset ( ggplot with jitter width = 0.05 in R Statistical Software) in order to show all data points
